mapper.insert: insert into member (memNo, memId, memPwd, memName, memPhone, memEmail, memRole, memState, memDate) values(memNoSeq.nextval, #{memId}, #{memPwd}, #{memName}, #{memPhone}, #{memEmail}, 2, 1, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from member where memId = #{id} and memRole=2 and memState=1
select * from member where memName = #{memName} and memPhone = #{memPhone}
select * from member where memId = #{memId} and memPhone = #{memPhone}
mapper.update: update member set memPwd = #{memPwd} where memId = #{memId} and memPhone = #{memPhone}
